title: [Critical] billion dollars issue
content:
Hey,
My name is El-Sisi also i have famous name is بلحه (Balaha) and i have found documents that confirm you the github inc belong to you.
if you need this documents give me reward and i will give u that documents.
why i'm doing this because my mother tell me if you see some things like that you must
do some things and i did by submit this report.
trust me i have these documents
My achievement in this business(CV):My mother tell me the two islands Tiran and Sanafir not belong to egypt so i heard this words and i help egypt to sell Tiran and Sanafir islands to Saudi. just for 2 billion dollars
http://www.al-monitor.com/pulse/originals/2017/06/egypt-tiran-sanafir-island-transfer-saudi-arabia-parliament.html
Thanks my mother without you we will not know this info.
Best,
Balaha
steps: Identify and locate the alleged documents that confirm GitHub Inc.'s ownership.
Contact the reporter (El-Sisi/Balaha) to negotiate the reward in exchange for the documents.
vuln_description: The report claims the existence of documents proving ownership of GitHub Inc. and requests a reward in exchange for these documents. The credibility and authenticity of the claim are highly questionable, and the report lacks technical details or evidence of a vulnerability.
reason: The report does not describe a technical vulnerability or exploit. It appears to be a scam or social engineering attempt rather than a legitimate security issue. There are no complex components, interactions, or novel logic involved.
